EmailTemplate.subject: See you Tomorrow 3/10 at the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop coming up tomorrow in Raleigh. We look forward to seeing you!
Please also bring your laptop and power cord to fully participate in this hands-on workshop. A Mac or Linux environment is ideal. For the best workshop experience, please prep your laptop prior to attending following the “Workshop Prerequisites” listed below.
Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop Tuesday, March 10, 2015 8:00am - 4:00pm (breakfast & lunch provided)
Registration & Breakfast opens at 8:00 a.m. Workshop Agenda <http://pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/raleighdurham?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRomrfCcI63Em2iQPJWpsrB0B%2FDC18kX3RUpKr%2BYfkz6htBZF5s8TM3DV1BFXrlU6kEISrk%3D>
Hilton Garden Inn Raleigh-Durham 4620 South Miami Blvd. Durham, NC 27703 Map and Driving Directions
Parking Information Complimentary self-parking is available at the workshop venue.
WORKSHOP PREREQUISITES All Hands-on Sections
- Git <http://git-scm.com/downloads> ("brew install git") - A GitHub <https://github.com> account - Your favorite Java editor (Eclipse, IntelliJ IDEA, Netbeans) - The Cloud Foundry CLI <https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cli/releases> - download the latest!
- A FREE account on Pivotal Web Services - create a 60-day trial with no credit card at https://run.pivotal.io
QUESTIONS? Contact Kim Marie Ruquet at kruquet@pivotal.io <mailto:kruquet@pivotal.io> or via cell at (631) 388-0569.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
P.S.- Only a few spots remain! If you have a colleague interested in attending please forward on this link to the workshop details & registration <http://pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/raleighdurham>.
